#define LWIP_TCP_TASK_STACKSIZE 1024

#define LWIP_ETH_TASK_STACKSIZE 1024

#define CMIOT_UPDATE_SIZE 0xA0000

#define CMIOT_DEFAULT_SEGMENT_SIZE_INDEX 3
